'''Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto Materials''' are [[Character Level-Up Material]]s used to increase the level of [[Character]] [[Talents]] beyond level 6. They can be [[converting|converted]] into each other using {{Item|Dream Solvent}}.
